 xcresources --help --verbose --no-ansi 2>&1
Usage:
    xcresources [OPTIONS] [XCODEPROJ] [OUTPUT_PATH]

Parameters:
    [XCODEPROJ]                   Xcode project file to inspect (automatically located on base of the current directory if not given)
    [OUTPUT_PATH]                 Path where to write to

Options:
    --silent                      Show nothing
    --version                     Show the version
    --[no-]ansi                   Show output without ANSI codes (default: true)
    --[no-]documented             Add documentation to the generated files (default: true)
    -v, --verbose                 Show more debugging information
    -x, --exclude FILE_PATTERN    File pattern which should be excluded (default: ["InfoPlist.strings"]) (default: ["InfoPlist.strings"])
    -n, --name NAME               Name of the resources constant (default: `basename OUTPUT_PATH`)
    -l, --language LANGUAGE       Default language to build the keys
    -h, --help                    print help
